title: Señorita
lyrics:
[intro] (Am)  (Cmaj7)  (F)  (Em-G)
 
[chorus]
I love it when you (Am)call me señorita
I wish I could pre(Cmaj7)tend I didn't need ya
But every touch is (F)ooh-la-la-la, it's true la-la-la
(Em)Ooh, I should be runnin'
(G)Ooh, you keep me comin' for ya
 
(Am) Land in Miami, the air was hot from summer (Cmaj7)rain
Sweat drippin' off me, before I even knew her (F)name, la-la-la
It felt like (Em)ooh-la-la-la, (G)yeah, no
 
(Am) Sapphire and moonlight, we danced for hours in the (Cmaj7)sand
Tequila sunrise, her body fit right in my (F)hands, la-la-la
It felt like (Em)ooh-la-la-la, (G) yeah
 
[chorus]
I love it when you (Am)call me señorita
I wish I could pre(Cmaj7)tend I didn't need ya
But every touch is (F)ooh-la-la-la, it's true la-la-la
(Em)Ooh, I should be runnin'
(G)Ooh, you know I love it when you
(Am) Call me señorita
I wish I could pre(Cmaj7)tend I didn't need ya
But every touch is (F)ooh-la-la-la, it's true la-la-la
(Em)Ooh, I should be runnin'
(G)Ooh, you keep me comin' for ya
 
(Am) Locked in the hotel, there's just some things that never (Cmaj7)change
You say we're just friends, but friends don't know the way you (F)taste, la-la-la...
'Cause you (Em)know it's been a long time comin', don't ya (G)let me fall
 
[bridge]
(Am)Ooh, when your lips undress me, hooked on your tongue
(Cmaj7)Ooh, love, your kiss is deadly. Don't-stop [pause]
 
[chorus]
I love it when you (Am)call me señorita
I wish I could pre(Cmaj7)tend I didn't need ya
But every touch is (F)ooh-la-la-la, it's true la-la-la
(Em)Ooh, I should be runnin'
(G)Ooh, you know I love it when you
(Am) Call me señorita
I wish I could pre(Cmaj7)tend I didn't need ya
But every touch is (F)ooh-la-la-la, it's true la-la-la
(Em)Ooh, I should be runnin'
(G)Ooh, you keep me comin' for ya
 
[outro]
(Am) All along I've been comin' for (Cmaj7)ya (for you)
And I hope it meant something to (F)ya (ooh ooh-ooh-ooh)
Call my name, I'll be comin' for (Em)ya, comin' for ya (G)
 
(Am)  (Cmaj7)  (F)
(Em)Ooh, I should be runnin'
(G)Ooh, you keep me comin' for ya (Am-single strum) [end]
